name: Never Laser Alone
description:
Using only the mouse, you control a small drone. When you come within range of a laser tether point, your drone automatically connects, creating a powerful laser which damages any enemies that cross it!

Be careful, enemies can damage you laser tether points and your power supply! If your power supply is destroyed, it's game over!

Everything in game was made during the Jam! - No pre-made assets, songs, sounds, etc were used!

Never Laser Alone was made in under 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

Pop into our discord for a chat!
